Name: 拯救大魔王2 Rescue the Great Demon 2
About the game: Notice: This is a standalone full game. Any player who hasn’t played the previous game in the series can also enjoy it. In Rescue the Great Demon 2 you will play as the weak Great Demon and discover a unique storyline. You will need to escape from your prison with your last six followers and try to survive in this chaotic continent. A horse, a carriage, a map, a story. Could you find the truth behind all this?
